column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////And when I say good
column2: I mean friggin' great.  Took the gf here for our anniversary
column3: and it did not disappoint.  First
column4: the ambiance is great.  Not the standard
column5: generic brass rails and tons of oak.  Great lighting
column8: not too loud.  The service was exceptional.  Our server was very attentive
column10: the manager came by at one point to ask how everything was and at another point to fold my gf's napkin while she was away from the table.
